```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
```

```{r}
train <- read_csv("train.csv")
test <- read_csv("test.csv")

test$epoch <- as.numeric(as.POSIXct(test$epoch))
train$epoch <- as.numeric(as.POSIXct(train$epoch))
test$epoch <- test$epoch - min(train$epoch)
train$epoch <- train$epoch - min(train$epoch)

TT <- read_csv("periods.csv")
```

Score
```{r}
score <- function(val_pred, val_real) {
  smape <- mean(abs(val_pred - val_real) / (abs(val_pred)+abs(val_real)))
  100 * (1 - smape)
}
```

```{r}
  #print(c(sat, coord, num_model, pred, " ???"))
  
  t1 <- unlist(TT[sat+1,coord])
  if (!pred) {
    tr <- train %>% filter(sat_id == sat)
  
    total <- length(tr$epoch)
    limit <- as.integer(0.8 * total)
    
    val <- tr[limit:total,]
    tr <- tr[1:(limit-1),]
    tr2 <- tr[as.integer(length(tr$id)*0.1):length(tr$id),]
    tr3 <- tr[as.integer(length(tr$id)*0.25):length(tr$id),]
    tr4 <- tr[as.integer(length(tr$id)*0.5):length(tr$id),]
    
    tr$aux <- unlist(tr[,coord+3])
    tr2$aux <- unlist(tr2[,coord+3])
    tr3$aux <- unlist(tr3[,coord+3])
    tr4$aux <- unlist(tr4[,coord+3])
    val$aux <- unlist(val[,coord+3])
  } else {

    tst <- test %>% filter(sat_id == sat)

    tr4 <- tr[as.integer(length(tr$id)*0.5):length(tr$id),]
```

Cases
```{r}
last_models <- as.vector(read_csv("cases5.csv"))
last_scores <- as.vector(read_csv("scores_cases5.csv"))

for (i in 0:599) {
  print(i)
  mods <- data.frame(sat_id=i,x=0,y=0,z=0,Vx=0,Vy=0,Vz=0)
  scores <- data.frame(sat_id=i,x=0,y=0,z=0,Vx=0,Vy=0,Vz=0)
  for (coo in 1:6) {
    best <- last_models[i+1,coo+1]
    mx <- last_scores[i+1,coo+1]
    for (mod in  c(48:167)) {
      sc <- model(i, coo, mod)
      if (sc > mx) {
        mx <- sc
        best <- mod
      }
    }
    mods[,coo+1] <- best
    scores[,coo+1] <- mx
    if (best != last_models[i+1,coo+1] & i %in% unique(test$sat_id)) {
     print(sprintf("Satelite: %i, coord: %i, ha camiado al modelo: %i, con %f de puntuacion", i,coo,mods[,coo+1], scores[,coo+1]))
    }
  }
  if (i == 0) {
    ans <- mods
    ans2 <- scores
  } else {
    ans <- rbind(ans, mods)
    ans2 <- rbind(ans2, scores)
  }
}

write_csv(ans, "cases6.csv", quote=F)
write_csv(ans2, "scores_cases6.csv", quote=F)
```
